cms.query.QueryText: -- Delete server tasks that are violating foreign key policy because of nolocks in inserting servertaks DELETE FROM [CMS_WebFarmServerTask] WHERE [ServerID] NOT IN (SELECT [ServerID] FROM [CMS_WebFarmServer]) -- Delete old tasks that were already processed DELETE FROM [CMS_WebFarmTask] WHERE [TaskIsAnonymous] = 0 AND [TaskID] NOT IN (SELECT [TaskID] FROM [CMS_WebFarmServerTask]) AND [TaskCreated] < dateadd(minute, -3, getdate())
